articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan claimed his seventh World Championship title on Monday at the age of 46... even though he vowed to retire at 45. Yet here he is once more. The supreme player at The Crucible.
articles.content: Ronnie O'Sullivan should be retired by now. He told me as much when we talked some years ago. He gave the age at which he would be done with snooker as 45, maximum. It's the eyes, you see. Snooker is… [+5334 chars]

articles.author: Tom Collomosse
articles.title: Toni Kroos is looking to deny Manchester City of a second consecutive Champions League Final - Daily Mail
articles.description: With three Champions League titles to his name, Toni Kroos has set a standard City are striving to reach yet he once looked certain to be chasing those dreams for City's cross-town rivals.
articles.content: With three Champions League titles to his name, Real Madrid star Toni Kroos has set a standard Manchester City are striving to reach yet he once looked certain to be chasing those dreams for City's c… [+4206 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Wynn-davies
articles.title: Ellis Cross, the retail assistant who beat Olympic champion Mo Farah over 10km - Daily Mail
articles.description: On Monday, Ellis Cross beat Mo Farah, a remarkable triumph for an amateur athlete who only finished ninth in the 10,000m at the British championships last summer.
articles.content:
An amateur and self-confessed 'club runner' beat Olympic champion Mo Farah in a 10km race having worked a full day at a running shop the day before.
Ellis Cross, 25, works six-hour shifts at Up &amp… [+6829 chars]
